title: Buffer Overflow Basics
summary: Exploit a simple stack-based buffer overflow to get shell access.

title: SQLi Playground
summary: Bypass login via blind SQL injection and extract the admin password.

title: XSS Reflected Fun
summary: Find a reflected XSS in the search feature and steal the flag.

title: Crypto-50: RSA OTP
summary: Recover a small RSA key encrypted with a one-time pad and decrypt the message.

title: Reversing: Obfuscated ELF
summary: Reverse-engineer an ELF binary to recover the hidden passphrase.

title: Forensics: Memory Dump
summary: Analyze a memory dump to locate the injected shellcode and retrieve the flag.

title: Stego: LSB Secrets
summary: Extract hidden data from an image using LSB steganography techniques.

title: Networking: MITM Attack
summary: Perform a man-in-the-middle on a simulated network and capture the flag packets.

title: PPC: Race Condition
summary: Exploit a race condition in a setuid root program to escalate privileges.

title: OSINT: Social Media Sleuth
summary: Gather open-source intelligence to trace the origin of a leaked document.

title: Hardware: UART Console
summary: Connect to a simulated UART console to retrieve the debug flag.

title: Smart Contract: Reentrancy
summary: Exploit a reentrancy bug in an Ethereum smart contract to drain its balance.
